This article is a scientific summary of a study that the authors implemented using version `r X@b_SpecificResults@a_SpecificShareable@shareable_outp_ls$session_ls$otherPkgs$TTU$Version` of the R package TTU [@TTUPackage] and has been automatically generated from study results by version `r paste0(X@a_Ready4showPaths@outp_data_dir_1L_chr,"/",X@a_Ready4showPaths@mkdn_data_dir_1L_chr,"/", what_1L_chr,"/CITATION.cff") %>% readLines() %>% purrr::map_chr(~ifelse(startsWith(.x,"version:"),stringr::str_sub(.x, start = 10),NA_character_)) %>% purrr::discard(is.na)` of the manuscript authoring program ttu_lng_ss [@TTUExtension]. `r get_background_text(results_ls)`
